body: So real looking suguha and asuna are real, but both real looking kirotos are simulations, and the alo kirito is real wheras alo asuna is a simulation? and why? the AI doesn't really seem to have a goal other than "look Kirito, I can get your bitches if I pretend to be you and also manipulate and extort them"

Here's the story: Suguha give consent to AI (kirito form) to fluff since Kirito is with Asuna. Asuna saw this and make a deal to release Suguha (eventhough Suguha wanted it) but the deal is of since Asuna never said "i rejected you" to the AI. The last bit is when the AI (Asuna form) shows Kirito both of them just like it did to Asuna at first.
I'm back to get confused
Both of them are simulation including Asuna her self.

Right now my brain is having a chaos😅
The  art is good but pls make a stroy that we can understand..
I got the gist of it but bruh🤣
Quedé igual de confundido que los gringos pero siendo sincero la paja estuvo muy buena ☺️
This was confusing
What would suppose to happen ? It’s obvious, Kirito regain his right and disable that program, replant that seed and have sex with both of them every day . That’s it .

It’s not really ntr since that A.I is still Kirito in a physical way and since at the end, Suguha and Asuna still say that they love the real Kirito . They not really accepted you, they only accepted him as the avatar of Kirito . 
Kirito don’t need it, he just have to let crash that program and replant that seed and make an harem with these two in real world since both of them get used by his body now .
Huh? I don't understand what happened like did he NTR himself with himself? Or something like that I'm just confused
What did I just read? I am so confused that I don't want to understand anymore.
That ending tho

Also, wouldn't abstaining from using the amusphere help rid of this problem as well? It's just tampering with the users sensory inside the VR world and transferring it back to the users. Given enough time it'll probably wear out, as long as they don't give their body anymore arousing stimulatiom that is.

"What are you gonna do?", What are you gonna do indeed. If you gots the brain for tech then go and make an anti program for it and destroy that A.I., for fucks sake kirito's been studying about V.R. tech stuff so this should be right up his alley.
I'm so sad rn
Kirito suckass
I want NTR with Klain raping Asuna, he was treated like dirt in the original work
NTR without Kirito being cucked is not my NTR.
kinda bizarre

I don't get it
